Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, just short of a good length and outside off, Shehzad chops on the back foot to point
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, back of a length and outside off, Shehzad stylishly drives on the back foot, splitting cover-point and extra-cover. Top shot
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length ball on off stump, played back to the bowler
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, leg-stump half-volley, whipped away to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Saad Nasim, 1 run, short of a length on off, skids on to rap the thigh. He looks to work it across the line and does not connect
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full on middle, driven on the front foot to the left of mid-on
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, non-turning length-ball offbreak, worked on the back foot to the leg side

Narine to Saad Nasim, no run, pushed through on middle, no turn, beats the inside edge, but swings in the air and raps the pad in front of middle. Was it heading down leg? Not given. I thought that would go onto hit the stumps
Narine to Saad Nasim, 1 run, full on off, clipped through midwicket
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run
Narine to Saad Nasim, 1 run, back of a length and angled in, twirled through midwicket
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, no run
Sohail Tanvir to Saad Nasim, 2 runs, back of a length on off stump, hoicked across the line over wide mid-on
Sohail Tanvir to Saad Nasim, OUT, throat-high short ball just outside off, cramps Nasim for room. He shimmies out, pulls and top-edges it in the air. Rizwan, the keeper, tracks down the skier
Wicket: ['Saad Nasim c †Mohammad Rizwan b Sohail Tanvir 5 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 83.33']

Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, hip-high short ball on off, picked off through midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Pietersen, 1 run, full on off, KP is off the king pair with a little nudge to the leg side
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, shortish and outside off, Shehzad throws his bat at it and scythes it to the third man boundary
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, knuckle ball goes the other way outside off, dabbed to point
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, pushed through on a length outside off, tapped to cover
Narine to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, really full on off, Shehzad plays a wristy drive to long-on
Narine to Pietersen, no run, KP drives away from the body and swishes the ball to cover
Narine to Pietersen, no run, full and outside off, gets forward and plays it back to Narine
Narine to Pietersen, 1 run, looks like a seam-up quick fizzer, punched down the ground to long-on
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, full-toss on off, cracked to mid-off

Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, chopped on. Too close to the off stump for the cut although the length was short enough for the shot. Shehzad flashes his hands at the ball and ends up dragging a thick inside edge back onto the stumps
Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, FOUR, Rossouw uses his feet right away and lifts this full ball over the top
Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, FOUR, back of a length on leg stump, heaved disdainfully to the midwicket boundary

Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, 2 runs, Narine runs in from deep third man but the ball dies in front of him. Rossouw uses his feet and is forced to fetch this length ball. Slices an outside edge, and gets away
Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, 1 run, short of a length, backs away and cuts hard and straight to Narine at deep third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Rossouw, 1 leg bye, back of a length on leg stump, beats the pull, pings the the pad and rolls to the off side
Bilawal Bhatti to Pietersen, FOUR, length and outside off, KP flashes an outside edge that steaks away to the third-man boundary
Bilawal Bhatti to Pietersen, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, slogged to leg
Bilawal Bhatti to Rossouw, no run, yorker on the leg stump, dug out
Bilawal Bhatti to Rossouw, SIX, full on the leg stump, launched over long-on for a six
Bilawal Bhatti to Rossouw, FOUR, Rossouw flits around the crease, this is a very full ball outside leg. Picked up and whipped away behind square on the leg side. Rossouw has raced to 21 off 8 balls
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, starts off with a skiddy short ball outside off, KP reads the length. Goes on the back foot and chops the ball square on the off side
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, 1 run, dragged down shorter on the leg stump, Rossouw is quick to rock back and pull to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, fuller and slides in with the arm, KP sits back, picks off the pads and clips through square leg now
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, no run, Rossouw backs away outside leg, this is a flat dart on middle. Chopped to cover
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, no run, pushed through full on middle, not much spin, Rossouw aims to dink it away with a scoop. He can only toe-end the ball to the off side
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, 1 run, shortish on the hips, pulled on the back foot through backward square leg
Narine to Rossouw, 1 run
Narine to Pietersen, SIX, good length and outside off, KP winds up, unleashes a strong swing of the arms and sends the ball over the long-on boundary
Narine to Pietersen, no run, flatter and quicker outside off, KP slices it to short third man
Narine to Pietersen, 2 runs, short and turns away outside off, slapped hard to sweeper cover on the back foot
Narine to Pietersen, 1 run, good length on off stump, KP slogs but can't beat deep midwicket
Narine to Rossouw, 1 run, Rossuw backs away outside leg, opens up the off side, and drives it inside-out to long-off
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, 1 run, short legbreak on leg stump, Rossouw is quick to skip back and pull to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, really full on off stump, KP drives to long-off
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, 1 run, tossed up outside leg stump, slog-swept away to deep square leg
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, FOUR, here comes KP. Down the track, and clouts a full-toss down the ground, beats long-on to his left. That flew to the boundary
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, KP uses his feet again, this time he is beaten in flight. Ends up dragging the ball over midwicket
Yasir Shah to Rossouw, SIX, Rossouw attacks Yasir now. He runs down the track, takes it on the half-volley, and thwacks it over midwicket for a big six. Rossouw hits the roof of the Sharjah Stadium
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, very full and outside off, KP laces a drive to long-off

Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, OUT, Rossouw charges down the track and looks to loft a full ball. He gets more height rather than distance. Bhatti takes the catch at long-off. Rossouw just toe-ended it in the air. Irfan Jnr lets out an animated roar and a fist pump to boot
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, short of a length and outside off, KP swipes it away to deep midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Perera, 1 run, short on leg stump, tucks Thisara up for room. Awkwardly pulled to deep midwicket
Wicket: ['RR Rossouw c Bilawal Bhatti b Mohammad Irfan 33 (18b 3x4 2x6) SR: 183.33']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, overpitched and outside off, KP drills a drive to long-off
Mohammad Irfan to Perera, no run, full and veering down leg, grazes the pad of Thisara, excellent stop from Rizwan. Excellent over from Irfan Jnr
Bilawal Bhatti to Pietersen, FOUR, length ball on off stump, KP smashes it away to the midwicket boundary. He has regained his touch alright
Delport to Pietersen, 1 run, shortish and outside off, chopped to sweeper
Delport to Perera, no run, length ball on off, Thisara looks to muscle it out of the ground. Ends up poking back to the bowler

Delport to Perera, no run, What an unfortunate way to be dismissed. He walks off. Oh wait, KP has slid his bat in. Mute the celebrations, Lahore. Full on the stumps, hit back to the bowler. KP was straying out of the crease, backing up. Delport collects the ball and breaks the stumps. The replays suggest KP had slid his bat in time. He's safe
Delport to Perera, OUT, length ball outside off, in the slot, Perera does not get hold of the big hit. Miscues to long-off running to his left
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, neither short nor wide enough for the cut. Beaten outside off
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, very full on off, driven through the covers
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, very full and wide outside off, driven crisply to sweeper cover
Wicket: ['NLTC Perera c sub (Aamer Yamin) b Delport 1 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 20.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, off-stump yorker, jabbed away to sweeper cover's right
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full and wide outside off, scythed away to sweeper's left
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, full on off stump, KP swings to long-on
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 2 runs, might have been a googly, nudged with the spin through square leg
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, KP comes down the track, this short and outside off, drilled down to long-off
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, backs away outside leg and swishes a legbreak to long-off
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, dragged short on off, pulled on the back foot to long-on
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, quicker legbreak, turns away outside off, Sarfraz steps outside leg and cracks it square through the off side
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, length ball, slower possibly, Sarfraz slogs early and is hit on the pad
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, length and outside off, Sarfraz swings wildly again. He can't touch it
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, back of a length and outside off, Sarfraz connects with this and sends it clattering past cover's left
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, SIX, full on off stump, right up in Sarfraz's hitting arc. He holds his shape and sends the white ball flying over midwicket now
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, shortish on off, cramps Sarfraz for room. Dragged away to long-on
Delport to Pietersen, SIX, length ball outside off, KP lays into it. Lofts it stylishly over the sightscreen. 17 runs off the over. Will Baz go back to Delport again?
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, Sarfraz eyes up the leg side with a slog-sweep and under-edges it past the leg stump for a couple
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full on the stumps, hoicked away to deep square leg
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, 1 run, flat dart on the off stump, cramps KP for room. Miscued to cover
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run
Yasir Shah to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, dropped short on off, heaved away to cow corner
Yasir Shah to Pietersen, no run, KP ventures for the switch-hit, this fizzes in quickly to rap his thigh. Heading down leg? Time for a time-out
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, short ball on off stump, Sarfraz times the pull well. Rocks back and pulls over backward square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, shortish and angling away outside off, stabbed to long-off
Sohail Tanvir to Pietersen, 1 run, picked off the pads to square-ish long leg
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower short ball outside off, Sarfraz slogs early and sends an inside edge to short fine leg
Sohail Tanvir to Pietersen, 1 run, slower short ball on leg stump, swatted to deep midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, SIX, Sarfraz and KP are keeping Quetta alive. Length and outside off, Sarfraz swings across the line and crashes Sohail over long-on
Narine to Pietersen, SIX, tossed-up offbreak on off stump, KP launches it with the spin over midwicket. That's some way to get to a fifty. Good start to the over for Quetta

Narine to Pietersen, SIX, back-to-back sixes off Narine. This is massive. Length ball outside off, clubbed away a long waaaaay over wide long-on. Sarfraz pumps his fist and Sir Viv is up on his feet in the Quetta dug-out
Narine to Pietersen, 1 run, full and outside off, smeared back to the bowler. Narine sticks his left hand out and takes a stinging blow

Narine to Sarfraz Ahmed, SIX, full on off, right in the slot for Sarfraz. He dismisses it over midwicket with a powerful slog-sweep. That exploded from the middle of the bat. Sir Viv enjoyed that too. Narine under pressure, though
Narine to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, swished to wide long-off
Narine to Pietersen, 1 run, short of a length on off, a back-foot punch to cover ensues. 21 off that over
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, SIX, full-toss on middle stump, KP hammers it over the straight boundary for another six
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, Sarfraz backs away outside leg, this is very full on off, not a yorker though, jammed out to sweeper cover
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, SIX, Irfan Jnr loses his length and loses his head. Offers another full-toss on off stump, which is clobbered over midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, SIX, yet another off-stump full-toss. KP goes much straighter now. Pings this over the long-on boundary. Poor death bowling from Lahore

Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, SIX, KP seems unstoppable. Make it a hat-trick of sixes. Fractionally short and outside off, KP is quick to rock back and pull it over wide long-on. 47 off last two overs. Whoa
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, pitched up and outside off. Lahore are not getting their lengths right. Sarfraz backs away and merrily lifts it over cover

Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT, and Sarfraz nicks behind with his side 11 away from the target. He receives a rousing reception from the dug-out. Sarfraz backs away outside leg, this is a back of a length delivery outside off. He throws his bat at the ball and edges it behind. Carries low to Rizwan
Sohail Tanvir to Anwar Ali, SIX, first-ball six for Anwar. So, that is why he has been sent ahead of Mahmudullah. Full and outside off, swings through the line and hits over long-off
Sohail Tanvir to Anwar Ali, 2 runs, dragged short and outside off, uses the pace and runs it down to third man

Sohail Tanvir to Anwar Ali, FOUR, length and outside off, Anwar Ali goes downtown again and seals victory for Quetta. Some stunning power-hitting from them at the death. Quetta move to the top of the table
